ct:Test.name: FileNameCheckProduct
ct:Test.description: The name of the file should be consistent with the product field in the MPH

ct:Test.name: ProductNameValidFormat
ct:Test.description: The product name must be of the format <code><product_ID[10]><processing_stage_flag[1]><originator_ID[3]<start_day[8]><'_'[1]><start_time[6]><'_'[1]><duration[8]><'_'[1]><phase[1]><cycle[3]><'_'[1]><relative_orbit[5]><'_'[1]><absolute_orbit[5]><'_'[1]><counter[4]><'.'[1]><satellite_ID[2]><.extension[]><code>

ct:Test.name: ProcStageFlagMatchesProductName
ct:Test.description: The processing stage flag must match character 11 of the product name

ct:Test.name: SensingStartDayMatchesProductName
ct:Test.description: The sensing start day must match character 15-22 of the product name

ct:Tests.ct:Test: substr(14, 4, str(../product)) == substr(7, 4, str(.)) && substr(18, 2, str(../product)) == if(substr(3, 3, str(.)) == "JAN", "01", if(substr(3, 3, str(.)) == "FEB", "02", if(substr(3, 3, str(.)) == "MAR", "03", if(substr(3, 3, str(.)) == "APR", "04", if(substr(3, 3, str(.)) == "MAY", "05", if(substr(3, 3, str(.)) == "JUN", "06", if(substr(3, 3, str(.)) == "JUL", "07", if(substr(3, 3, str(.)) == "AUG", "08", if(substr(3, 3, str(.)) == "09", "SEP", if(substr(3, 3, str(.)) == "OCT", "10", if(substr(3, 3, str(.)) == "NOV", "11", if(substr(3, 3, str(.)) == "DEC", "12", "??")))))))))))) && substr(20, 2, str(../product)) == substr(0, 2, str(.))

ct:Test.name: SensingStartTimeMatchesProductName
ct:Test.description: The sensing start time must match character 24-29 of the product name

ct:Tests.ct:Test: substr(23, 2, str(../product)) == substr(12, 2, str(.)) && substr(25, 2, str(../product)) == substr(15, 2, str(.)) && substr(27, 2, str(../product)) == substr(18, 2, str(.))

ct:Test.name: PhaseIDMatchesProductName
ct:Test.description: The phase identifier field must match character 39 of the product name

ct:Test.name: CycleMatchesProductName
ct:Test.description: The cycle field must match characters 40-42 of the product name

ct:Test.name: RelOrbitMatchesProductName
ct:Test.description: The relative orbit field must match characters 44-48 of the product name

ct:Test.name: AbsOrbitMatchesProductName
ct:Test.description: The cycle field must match characters 50-54 of the product name

ct:Test.name: SatelliteMatchesProductName
ct:Test.description: Characters 61-62 of the product name must be `N1' for ENVISAT products

ct:Test.name: ProcStageFlagValid
ct:Test.description: The processing stage flag must be N

ct:Test.name: AcquisitionStationValid
ct:Test.description: The acquisition station must be PDHS-E or PDHS-K

ct:Test.name: ProcessingCentreValid
ct:Test.description: The processing centre must be PDHS-E, PDHS-K, F-PAC or LRAC

ct:Test.name: SoftwareVersionLevel2MatchesCurrent
ct:Test.description: The software version for Level 2 must be RA-2/5.06 or RA2/6.02L04 or RA2/6.03

ct:Test.name: SoftwareVersionLevel1MatchesCurrent
ct:Test.description: The software version for Level 1 must be RA-2/5.06 or RA2/6.02L04 or RA2/6.03

ct:Test.name: SoftwareVersionLevel0MatchesCurrent
ct:Test.description: The software version for Level 0 must be KSPT_L0/4303 or KSPT_L0/4504

ct:Test.name: PhaseValid
ct:Test.description: The phase must be '2'

ct:Test.name: VectorSourceValid
ct:Test.description: The vector source should be FP or DN

ct:Test.name: UTCToSBTNearSensingTime
ct:Test.description: The difference between UTC to SBT and sensing time should be less than 100 minutes

ct:Test.name: IsUnsignedInt32
ct:Test.description: The value should be larger than or equal to 0 and less than 2^32

ct:Test.name: IsNonZero
ct:Test.description: The value should not be equal to 0

ct:Test.name: IsZero
ct:Test.description: The value should be equal to 0

ct:Test.name: IsZeroChar
ct:Test.description: The value should be equal to '0'

ct:Test.name: FileSizeMatches
ct:Test.description: The value should be equal to the file size

ct:Test.name: LeapUTCNotSet
ct:Test.description: The leap UTC must be set to all blanks (which evaluates to NaN)

ct:Test.name: LatitudeValid
ct:Test.description: The latitude must be between -90 and +90 degrees (units are 1e-6 degrees)

ct:Test.name: LongitudeValid
ct:Test.description: The longitude must be between -180 and +180 degrees (units are 1e-6 degrees)

ct:Test.name: SatTrackValid
ct:Test.description: The satellite track must be between 0 and +360 degrees

ct:Test.name: Level2ProcessingQualitySufficient
ct:Test.description: The Level 2 processing quality must be at least 9000 (90%)

ct:Test.name: Level1bProcessingQualitySufficient
ct:Test.description: The Level 1B processing quality must be at least 9500 (95%)

ct:Test.name: ProcessingQualitySufficient
ct:Test.description: The processing quality must be at least 1000 (10%)

ct:Test.name: AllMeasurementsValid
ct:Test.description: The number of valid measurements must be 10000 (100%)

ct:Test.name: NumMeasurementsLevel1ValidAboveThreshold
ct:Test.description: The number of valid measurements must be at least 1000 (10%)

ct:Test.name: NumMeasurements320MHzProcessedSufficient
ct:Test.description: The number of measurements processed for 320 MHz band must be at least 9500 (95%)

ct:Test.name: NumMeasurements80MHzProcessedBelowThreshold
ct:Test.description: The number of measurements processed for 80 MHz band must not be more than 400 (4%)

ct:Test.name: NumMeasurements20MHzProcessedBelowThreshold
ct:Test.description: The number of measurements processed for 20 MHz band must not be more than 100 (1%)

ct:Test.name: NumMeasurements320MHzProcessedLevel1AboveThreshold
ct:Test.description: The number of measurements processed for 320 MHz band at Level 1 must be at least 9000 (90%)

ct:Test.name: NumMeasurements80MHzProcessedLevel1AboveThreshold
ct:Test.description: The number of measurements processed for 80 MHz band at Level 1 must be at least 700 (7%)

ct:Test.name: NumMeasurements20MHzProcessedLevel1AboveThreshold
ct:Test.description: The number of measurements processed for 20 MHz band at Level 1 must be at least 300 (3%)

ct:Test.name: NumValidMeasurementsKuOceanRetrackerAboveThreshold
ct:Test.description: The percentage of valid Ku ocean retracker measurements must be at least 9000 (90%)

ct:Test.name: NumValidMeasurementsKuIce1RetrackerAboveThreshold
ct:Test.description: The percentage of valid Ku ice1 retracker measurements must be at least 8500 (85%)

ct:Test.name: NumValidMeasurementsKuIce2RetrackerBelowThreshold
ct:Test.description: The percentage of valid Ku ice2 retracker measurements must not be larger than 7000 (70%)

ct:Test.name: NumValidMeasurementsKuSeaIceRetrackerBelowThreshold
ct:Test.description: The percentage of valid Ku sea/ice retracker measurements must not be larger than 9000 (90%)
